entry.title: Hello world

entry.content:
I've been meaning to try making a blog on github pages for a while.

This is just a first post to try out.

To start out, I decided to try out Pelican. For now, it works well for hosting my blog on Github Pages and working out of the box. The biggest problems came from being on Windows. I always swear to myself to not work in Windows, but it has a lower activation energy even if I know I will end up spending hours because things are different from tutorials I've found.
